delivery

Class Manifest

  • java.lang.Object
    • delivery.Manifest

  • public class Manifest
extends java.lang.Object
    A manifest Class. Holds a list of trucks. Used to calculate the cost of restocking
    Author:
    Gary Bagnall

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Manifest(java.util.ArrayList<Truck> truckList) 
      Manifest(Stock storeStock)
      Creates an lists of trucks and populates them with the items that need to be reordered.
